Text:
function RYU_EP04_11()
    -- .承-2【11月第4週】「共学か保守か」
    SaveData.Title = "共学か保守か"

    -- //BG：メインストリート
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav")

    MSG([[ The week starts. By the time I got to school, the announcement about the Princess Election between Uran-san and Daria-san was already posted on the school bulletin board. ]])

    MSG([[ As expected of Daria-san. She acts swiftly after securing facts. ]])

    MSG([[ I had always felt she was truly reliable when on my side, but now I realize she’s a really troublesome opponent when she’s against me. ]])

    -- //BU：１Ｆ廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013aa")
    -- //BU：ヒユ・焦り、リラ・焦り
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1357.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Hey, hey Erika! What’s this about Daria-senpai and Uran-senpai running in the Princess Election!? I heard you’ve been close with Uran-senpai lately—do you know anything?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0441.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “Hyaaaaaaaa... The top handsome guy in school against the perfect Yamato Nadeshiko... It’s such an epic showdown, I’m super excited!” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1829.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “U-um... how did that go again...?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1358.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “You’re terrible at pretending you don’t know!” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1830.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Eek!?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Lira-san and Hiyu-san rushed up to me, completely flustered and unaware of what was going on. ]])

    MSG([[ Given the situation, it wasn’t something I could just casually talk about, so I hesitated whether to explain or not. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0515.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 “What reason is there to hide something? Just be honest, Erika-kun.” ]])
    -- //ダリア

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //SE：黄色い悲鳴
PLAY_SE("SEf008.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ Daria-san appeared there. The students nearby screamed, and some fainted as usual. ]])

    MSG([[ Her popularity remains as tremendous as ever. ]])

    STOP_SE("SEf008.wav",1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0516.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “This Princess Election is different from the usual. It has a clear purpose. I want you to explain that to everyone yourself.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1831.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “W-what do you mean? I honestly don’t understand what you’re saying.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0517.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Good grief. This is what it means.” ]])

    -- //BU：ウラン・驚き、ダリア・苦笑
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01fc")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ At that moment, unfortunately, Uran-san came through the shoe locker area. ]])

    MSG([[ Daria-san pointed at Uran-san and said: ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ib")
    DARIA_PARTICLE_02(150,0,0,100,500)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0518.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “This Princess Election isn’t just a contest of cuteness. It’s about keeping Yuriai Private Academy’s tradition alive or moving forward toward coeducation to improve the school.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0519.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “We want everyone to choose the future of Yuriai Private Academy together.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1832.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Th-the future...!?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //SE：どよめき
PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav")

    MSG([[ Eh. Daria-san just clearly said “advancing coeducation.” ]])

    MSG([[ To say that in the context of competing against Uran-san in the Princess Election, even I, not the sharpest, can understand the meaning. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0520.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Yes, I admit it. I’m the one who’s been secretly pushing for coeducation at Yuriai Private Academy all along.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01fc")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0521.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Ah, is ‘infiltrator’ the right term? Sorry, my memory’s a little hazy.” ]])

    STOP_SE("SEf005.wav",1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0637.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “D-did everyone hear that? As she just said herself, Daria-san has been aiming to bring coeducation to Yuriai Private Academy!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0638.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “I will fight to protect the traditions of Yuriai Private Academy. So please, I’d be grateful for your support.” ]])

    -- //SE：拍手（中）
PLAY_SE("SEa021.wav")

    MSG([[ The students around applauded at Uran-san’s words. ]])

    MSG([[ Those who were confused by Daria-san’s words clearly agreed with Uran-san. ]])

    MSG([[ That’s a relief. I thought “Oh no” when Daria-san took the initiative, but this Princess Election has a real chance. ]])

    MSG([[ I don’t know her motives, but revealing herself as the shadow pro-coed faction was definitely a blunder. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ca")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0522.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Oh my, it seems the pro-coed side is really disliked. What could be the reason, I wonder?” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0639.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “...Why don’t you ask yourself how terribly the pro-coed side has treated us conservatives?” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0523.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Haha. I think it’s best if you don’t make that scary face everyone’s watching you with<sprite="Emoji" name="star">.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ib")
    DARIA_PARTICLE_02(150,0,0,100,500)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0524.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Well, with this, the battle between the pro-coed and conservative factions has begun. Let’s settle this long war on the holy night festival at the end of the year.” ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san showed genuine anger, but Daria-san kept her usual nonchalant attitude as she walked away. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
STOP_ALL_SOUND(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP04_12")
end
